Welcome to [R 2 Phoenix]()! This site is dedicated to analyzing data from the [City of Phoenix](https://www.phoenixopendata.com/) open data platform.

<br>

### [Phoenix Crime Data]()

Taking a look at the Phoenix crime data to see how crime changed along with the shutdown of services in Phoenix as a consequence of COVID-19.
